name: Beat Brawler
description:
A game by Adam Parsley and Daniel Korsah

This is an in development project for the Games Engineering Module at Edinburgh Napier University

The game takes inspiration from the game "Crypt of the Necrodancer" and "One Finger Death Punch" and aspires to create an enjoyable rhythm based fighting game.

The inital idea was that the game would teach the player how to do complicated combos from 2D fighting games such as Street Fighter but currently it has evolved into a free from fighting game. In the future we would like to develop this combo trainer idea to help people get to grips with some of the mechanical complexities of traditional fighting games.

  • Acapella Music
  • Rhythm Fun
  • Fighting Game
